document.text:
Subject: FW: Query re: Epstein 
Date: Thu, 13 Feb 2020 15:17:25 +0000 
Just FYI. 
 Ori inal Messa e 
Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2020 10:16 AM 
To: Kadhim Shubber <kadhim.shubber@ft.com>; 
la>
Subject: RE: Query re: Epstein 
Thank you, Kadhim. Sony, we cannot provide guidance. We'll decline to comment. 
 Original Message 
From: Kadhim Shubber <kadhim.shubber@ft.com> 
Sent: 
Thursday. February 13. 
2020 10:13 AM 
To: 
Subject: Query re: Epstein 
Hi 
Hope you're 
both well! 
I'm working with colleagues in London about a story that DOJ had passed information to the UK FCA about Jes 
Staley's relationship with Epstein. 
You might have seen this morning that Barclays disclosed the UK's FCA and PRA are investigating Staley's 
statements about his links to Epstein. 
I wanted to check if there was any steer or background you could give me on the information DOJ passed to the 
UK authorities? And also if you had any comment? 
Kadhim 
Kadhim 
Shubber 
I 
Financial 
Times I 
+1 202 909 6430 
(cell) I 
@kadhim 
*This email was 
sent by a company owned by Financial Times Group Limited ("FT Group <http://aboutus.ft.com/corporate-
information/#axzz3rajCSIAt>"), 
EFTA00025082

registered office at Bracken House, One Friday Street, London, EC4M 9BT. 
Registered in England and Wales with company number 879531. This e-mail may contain confidential 
information. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately, delete all copies and do 
not distribute it further. It could' 'also contain personal views which are not necessarily those of the FT Group. 
We may monitor outgoing or incoming emails as permitted by law.' 
EFTA00025083
